title: VR-Based Social Education Design Strategy Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for job seekers focusing on cultivating problem-solving skills via VR simulation-based social phenomenon analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of core concepts through social issue simulations in VR environments
Learners can establish virtual team project designs and execution plans using VR-based collaboration tools
Learners can analyze at least three design elements (visual feedback, interaction methods, etc.) applied in VR educational designs
Learners can propose at least three strategies to increase learner engagement when developing VR educational scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
